# PED::SET_PED_TARGET_LOSS_RESPONSE

## Summary
Set the peds target loss response

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** pedIndex
* **COMBAT_TARGET_LOSS_RESPONSE** targetLossResponse

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
enum eTargetLossResponseType
{
	TLR_ExitTask,
	TLR_NeverLoseTarget,
	TLR_SearchForTarget
};
